agents.airline_operating_centre.FlightPlanSelector¶

class agents.airline_operating_centre.FlightPlanSelector(agent)¶

Bases: Role

FPS: Flight Plan Selector

This role decides which FP to use considering the expected cost of different flight plan alternatives. It does the role of the dispatcher when selecting between alternative FP possibilities for a given flight.

The need for this role is to provide the extraction of these functionalities to be done by an external agent.

__init__(agent)¶

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

Methods

__init__(agent)

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

decide_fp(msg)

It requests the select_fp function do to the selection, updates the option selected and provides the fp selected back.

select_fp(cost_options, flight_uid)

This is yield rather than a return to take into account the case where the agent is asynchronuous, e.g. when there is a human operator (see HMI_FP_SEL module).

send(msg)

Function to send messages to its own agent

send_option_selected(to, option_selected_fp, ...)

Reply back with the fp that has been selected for the flight.

wait_for_fp_selection_request(msg)

Entry point for the role.

It requests the select_fp function do to the selection, updates the option selected and provides the fp selected back.

select_fp(cost_options, flight_uid)¶

This is yield rather than a return to take into account the case where the agent is asynchronuous, e.g. when there is a human operator (see HMI_FP_SEL module).

Function to send messages to its own agent

send_option_selected(to, option_selected_fp, flight_uid)¶

Reply back with the fp that has been selected for the flight.

wait_for_fp_selection_request(msg)¶

Entry point for the role. Getting a request to select a flight plan for a given flight from a list of alternatives.

This only initialise the FP selected for the flight to nothing and calls the function to decide with FP to use

Mercury
